definition: Ministry of Environmental Protection
ring/hoop/loop/(chain) link/classifier for scores in archery etc/to surround/to encircle/to hem in
surname Huan
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
ministry/department/section/part/division/troops/board/classifier for works of literature, films, machines etc

sentences.english: The ministry plans to adopt the new standards nationally by 2016.
sentences.chinese: 环保部表示，新标准拟于2016年全面实施。

sentences.english: Chinese and Russian environmental protection departments have also set up a hotline link.
sentences.chinese: 中俄环保部门还建立了热线联系。

sentences.english: He was appointed to the newly established Department of the Environment.
sentences.chinese: 他获任命到新成立的环保部工作。

sentences.english: Chinese Environmental Protection Administration fines leather factories from rich countries every year.
sentences.chinese: “中国环保部门每年都为富国皮革厂开出罚单”。

sentences.english: The Ministry of Environmental Protection confirmed something nasty was lurking in the air.
sentences.chinese: 环保部证实了空气中确实有些不良成分。

sentences.english: Failure to satisfy the ministry over its concerns could lead to cancellation of the two projects.
sentences.chinese: 满足环保部忧虑的失败可能导致取消这两个项目。

sentences.english: We are required by environment protecting department to use anthracite.
sentences.chinese: 环保部门要求我们使用无烟煤。

sentences.english: That's according to a just-released report by Florida's Department of Environmental Protection.
sentences.chinese: 这是佛罗里达环保部最新发布的报告。

sentences.english: To assist and manage leaders from department of environmental protection departments.
sentences.chinese: 协助管理环保部门领导班子。

sentences.english: Pan said in his appeal for the vote, the results of which he said he would send to China's environment minister.
sentences.chinese: 他说，他会把投票结果写信呈国家环保部部长。

sentences.english: The environment ministry declined to provide information about the case.
sentences.chinese: 环保部拒绝提供这项调查的信息。
